title: Maggie Alphonsi: My team of the Rugby World Cup's pool stage
text:
Following the conclusion of the Rugby World Cup pool stages, Maggie Alphonsi picks her team of the tournament so far plus her hero and villain.

15 Beauden Barrett (New Zealand)

The spark behind many of New Zealand’s better moments so far and was particularly impressive against South Africa.

14 Kotaro Matsushima (Japan)

A number of wingers have impressed - Josh Adams in particular, with his five tries - but Matsushima has to be in there for the tries he has scored and the spark he has provided for the hosts.

13 Semi Radrada (Fiji)

Has excelled on the wing and in the centre and is my player of the tournament so far. He’s just electric, a brilliant carrier of the ball and so hard to tackle....
description: Following the conclusion of the Rugby World Cup pool stages, Maggie Alphonsi picks her team of the tournament so far plus her hero and villain.
